Name: Luanda
Description: The capital region, known for its coastal location, port, and urban development.

Name: Benguela
Description: A coastal region known for its beaches, colonial architecture, and vibrant culture.

Name: Cabinda
Description: An exclave region known for its oil resources and tropical forests.

Name: Huambo
Description: A region in central Angola known for its agricultural activities and scenic landscapes.

Name: Huila
Description: A region with a diverse geography, including mountains, forests, and savannas.

Name: Kwanza Norte
Description: Known for its natural beauty and proximity to Luanda.

Name: Kwanza Sul
Description: A coastal region known for its agriculture and proximity to Luanda.

Name: Malanje
Description: Located in the north-central part of the country, known for its forests and agriculture.

Name: Moxico
Description: A region with rich biodiversity and vast natural resources.

Name: Uíge
Description: Known for its agricultural production, including coffee and tobacco.

Name: Zaire
Description: Located in the northwest, this region is known for its oil and mineral resources.

Name: Lunda Norte
Description: Known for its mineral wealth, including diamonds.

Name: Lunda Sul
Description: A mineral-rich region, particularly known for diamonds.
